title: New Release: Bree Serif
content:
In 2008 _TypeTogether_ released the [Bree](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414121953/http:/www.type-together.com/Bree) typeface, a sleek sans serif that quickly became a favorite among brand and editorial designers.

[Bree Serif](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414121953/http:/www.type-together.com/Bree%20Serif) follows the same theme as its predecessor. It is a young and energetic upright italic that approaches readers with hip and somewhat elegant charm. It has a range of styles that can perform as counterparts to the original [Bree](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414121953/http:/www.type-together.com/Bree) fonts. At the same time though they bring a whole range of new and individual features that make [Bree Serif](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414121953/http:/www.type-together.com/Bree%20Serif) a separate type family in its own right.

The characters in [Bree Serif](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414121953/http:/www.type-together.com/Bree%20Serif) maintain the original flavour of handwriting, but have a more subtle appearance to support optimal editorial usage. The slabby nature of its shapes, particularly in the heavier weights, makes for a strong impression.

Some of the characteristic features of its sans serif cousin are present in [Bree Serif](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414121953/http:/www.type-together.com/Bree%20Serif) too, such as the single-story ‘a’, the cursive ‘e’ and the rhythmical ‘k’ and ‘y’. Alternate letters of these are also available when a more neutral look is desired.

[Bree Serif](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414121953/http:/www.type-together.com/Bree%20Serif) offers a mixture of fluid and attractive forms that convey a contemporary and vivid aspect. If you loved the multi- award wining [Bree](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414121953/http:/www.type-together.com/Bree), you will surely love its seriffed cousin!

Designed by _José Scaglione_ and _Veronika Burian_.

More information: [Bree Serif](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414121953/http:/www.type-together.com/Bree%20Serif)
